descriptions.EAST: Cobblestones lead onto a platform illuminated by, is that sunlight?!!
descriptions.NORTH: This is the way you have came from, a line of chalk snakes backward deeper into the temple.
descriptions.WEST: A stone wall fifty feet tall with vines growing on it stands before you.
descriptions.SOUTH: A stone floor extends beneath you, going under a stone arch

descriptions.EAST: You see a dimly lit cavern in front of you.
descriptions.NORTH: In this direction you see a stone arch with a small white marking of chalk
descriptions.WEST: An ivy covered wall stands before you.
descriptions.SOUTH: A glowing light beckons you down the tunnel.

descriptions.EAST: Stairs lead down into complete darkness
descriptions.NORTH: More cobblestones lead off into the distance
descriptions.WEST: There is still an ivy covered wall standing before you.
descriptions.SOUTH: Two behemoth statues block the passage.

descriptions.EAST: The floor you stand on starts to shake. Then it falls beneath you into a deep pit.
descriptions.NORTH: The floor you stand on starts to shake. Then it falls beneath you into a deep pit.
descriptions.WEST: The floor you stand on starts to shake. Then it falls beneath you into a deep pit.
descriptions.SOUTH: The floor you stand on starts to shake. Then it falls beneath you into a deep pit.

descriptions.EAST: You see the edge of the room.
descriptions.NORTH: Cobblestones lead onto a platform illuminated by, is that sunlight?!!
descriptions.WEST: More cobblestones lead off into the distance.
descriptions.SOUTH: Stairs lead down into complete darkness.

descriptions.EAST: In the darkness with your hands out in front of you, your fingers grasp what must be a keyhole!
descriptions.NORTH: As you fumble around in the dark, your knee bumps what must be a stair leading up.
descriptions.WEST: As you fumble around in the dark, your knee bumps what must be a stair leading up.
descriptions.SOUTH: You stumble into a wall at the end of the cave.
